name: Super Crusher 1000
description:
Demon Cube is wreaking havoc through the halls of hell. Hades Cube does not appreciate this and has ordered them to be destroyed.

Help Demon Cube continue raining hell on Hell (that makes sense, I think). Fortunately, his powers are able to keep the crushing walls at bay as long as he feeds on destruction. 

How long can you survive!

NOTE: Hitting Quit just stops the game. Does not exit the full screen. Controls

Movement - WASD/Arrow Keys

Credits

Music - DeltaBreaker -  https://opengameart.org/users/deltabreaker
